title: Invoice overdue: CloudFirst AG
message: Invoice INV-2026-020 (€8,500) from CloudFirst AG is 10 days overdue. 2 reminders sent. Anna promised payment by end of this week.

title: Urgent email needs reply: SmartHome bug report
message: Frank Hartmann from SmartHome Systems reported a critical bug — IoT dashboard charts not loading. Investor demo tomorrow. Reply ASAP.

title: Tax documents due: March 15
message: Your tax accountant needs 2025 filing documents by March 15. Documents needed: invoices, expenses, bank statements, insurance, contracts.

title: No reply: BioPharm Research inquiry
message: Dr. Andreas Vogel from BioPharm Research sent a high-value inquiry (€70K+ project) and hasn't received a reply. Respond within 24 hours to maintain momentum.

title: Revenue trend: Strong February projected
message: Based on current invoices and pipeline, February revenue is projected at €47,200 — a 14% increase over January (€41,300). Keep it up!

title: Stale lead: FoodTech Berlin
message: Sophie Becker from FoodTech Berlin replied to your outreach 4 days ago asking about pricing. No response sent yet.

title: Meeting prep: TechVision Partnership Call
message: You have a partnership call with Hans Mueller (TechVision) at 10:00 AM today. Prepare annual contract terms and Q1 milestone review.

title: Server maintenance: Feb 22
message: Hetzner server maintenance scheduled for February 22, 2:00-4:00 AM CET. ~30 minutes expected downtime. Notify affected clients.

title: 9 emails need reply
message: You have 9 emails flagged as needing a reply: TechVision (contract), CloudFirst (payment), FinanceHub (questions), SecureNet (requirements), MedTech (proposal), SmartHome (bug), DataStream (review), LogiTrans (feedback), RetailMax (rate limits).

title: New high-value lead: SecureNet signed
message: SecureNet Cyber (€60K) signed NDA and is ready to proceed. This is your largest project to date. Kickoff meeting scheduled Feb 18.
